item.description:
www.starhop.com/aerospacefest/schedule.aspx
www.starhop.com/aerospacefest/default.aspx

Join the Discovery Center for Aerospacefest 2012: X-treme Flight, an astronomy and aviation extravaganza.

This year’s festival will feature planes that have and are pushing the envelope in flight – like the newly displayed XF8U-2 Crusader – and planetarium show Attack of the Space Pirates, coming back by popular demand featuring space explorers flying to save the universe from the schemes of space pirates.

Meet Astronaut Rick Searfoss! Please use the links above to learn about the full schedule of events.

Adults: $15, Children: $11, Students/Seniors: $13

To find me, call me at the event at 603-312-6735.  Thanks, Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Aerospacefest 2012
